bug.short_desc: The sealart suggests me to read 'None' man page.
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #1431134 +++
Description of problem: Create a default 'kde plasma workspace' installation of fedora25 login to the desktop and see the selinux alert application light up in no time SELinux is preventing sddm-helper from 'create' accesses on the directory .kde.
***** Plugin catchall_boolean (89.3 confidence) suggests ******************
If you want to allow polyinstantiation to enabled Then you must tell SELinux about this by enabling the 'polyinstantiation_enabled' boolean. You can read 'None' man page for more details. Do setsebool -P polyinstantiation_enabled 1
=====================
The sealert suggests me to read 'None' man page.
